block.p: American League CHICAGO WHITE SOX--Signed SS Michael Morse and 2B John Lackaff. NEW YORK YANKEES--Called up RHP Jake Westbrook from Columbus of the International League. Optioned RHP Darrell Einertson to Columbus. TAMPA BAY DEVIL RAYS--Placed OF Greg Vaughn on the 15-day disabled list.

American League CHICAGO WHITE SOX--Signed SS Michael Morse and 2B John Lackaff. NEW YORK YANKEES--Called up RHP Jake Westbrook from Columbus of the International League. Optioned RHP Darrell Einertson to Columbus. TAMPA BAY DEVIL RAYS--Placed OF Greg Vaughn on the 15-day disabled list.

National League COLORADO ROCKIES--designated C Jason Dewey for assignment. LOS ANGELES DODGERS--Traded C Adam Melhuse to the Colorado Rockies for a player to be named. Activated 3B Adrian Beltre from the 15-day disabled list. MONTREAL EXPOS--Optioned RHP Guillermo Mota to Ottawa of the International League. Designated LHP David Moraga for assignment. Recalled RHP Brad Rigby and LHP Scott Forster from Ottawa.
BOISE STATE--Named Mike Maynard track and field coach. NEW MEXICO--Named Matt Henry track and field coach.
